body.name: Portable Washing Machine,Mini Washer and Dryer Combo,9L Upgraded Large Capacity Foldable Washer.Deep Cleaning of Baby clothes and other Small Clothes.Mini Washing Machine for Apartments, Travel.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 8 hrs 8 mins
features: 【Portable Washing Machine】 Mini portable washing machine is small and lightweight, making portable washer easy to carry.Mini washer machine the body weighs only 3 lbs, compact and easy to carry, ideal for your apartment, dorm, hotel, travel or camping! Our portable washer and dryer is made of TPE and food-grade silicone material, protecting the health of you and your family.

【Portable Washer Easy to Operate】This portable washer and dryer has a 3-minute, 5-minute and 10-minute 3-mode timer buttons, allowing you to easily complete various washing requirements. PS. Fill the washing machine with 2/3 of water to achieve better washing effect.

【Powerful decontamination】This mini washing machine provides all-round imitation hand scrubbing, suitable washing speed, and strong decontamination.Portable washing machine very suitable for washing small clothes such as baby clothes, underwear or socks, keeping you and your family healthy! Not recommended for large clothes.

【Foldable Washing Machine】: Despite portable mini washing machine small size, our portable washer dryer packs a punch with its powerful motor and efficient cleaning performance. Mini portable washer and dryer can handle a variety of fabrics and clothing items, including baby clothes, underwear, sock, and more.Not recommended for large clothes.

【Washing Machine Folding Design】This small portable washing machine cleverly adopts a foldable design, which measures 12.5x12.5x13.5 inches when unfolded and 12.5x12.5x6 inches when folded. Easy to store, Small washing machine it can be easily placed between shelves or under the bed without taking up too much space in your home.
body.description: Portable Washing Machine mini washing machine This washing machine provides a full range of imitation hand scrubbing, precise washing speed, and powerful decontamination effects. Perfect for washing small items like baby clothes, underwear or socks to keep you and your family healthy! Not recommended: jeans, long skirts, bathrobes and other bulky clothes. Mini washer is equipped with a spinner that removes excess water but does NOT fully dry the clothes!! Note: dryer can only be used in 3-minute mode to avoid being ejected. PS. No need to put in the drainage basket when washing clothes, Fill 2/3 of the washing machine with water for better washing effect. Note: If you need to shake out the water, you can use the dehydration function repeatedly, but you need to fix the dehydration blue to prevent the dehydration basket from falling off during rotation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Portable Washing Machine ARITAN preach a safe, hygienic, healthy and portable lifestyle.

Portable Washing Machine Mini Washing Machine The washing machine weighs only 3.3 pounds and measures 11.5 x 11x 11 inches ,When unfolded and 11.5 x 11 x 5 inches when folded. DO NOT put in large clothing DO NOT overload with too many clothes Note: This does not completely dehydrate the garment, it just ensures that it won't drip. Portable Washing Machine mini washing machine This washing machine provides a full range of imitation hand scrubbing, precise washing speed, and powerful decontamination effects. Perfect for washing small items like baby clothes, underwear or socks to keep you and your family healthy! Not recommended: jeans, long skirts, bathrobes and other bulky clothes. Mini washer is equipped with a spinner that removes excess water but does NOT fully dry the clothes!! Note: dryer can only be used in 3-minute mode to avoid being ejected. PS. No need to put in the drainage basket when washing clothes, Fill 2/3 of the washing machine with water for better washing effect. Note: If you need to shake out the water, you can use the dehydration function repeatedly, but you need to fix the dehydration blue to prevent the dehydration basket from falling off during rotation.

Folding Washing Machine The new and improved portable washer is equipped with a more powerful motor than the previous model, which ensures a more efficient and comprehensive wash for powerful stain removal results.High-speed operation controls the washing rhythm, and the cleaning is more powerful. Washer and Dryer Combo Portable washer machine has a semi-automatic cleaning function with simple one-button control. In addition, the mini washer is equipped with a spinner that removes excess water but does NOT fully dry the clothes!!（The bottom suction cup must be secured to prevent running.） Reasonable Drainage Design Self-contained drainage pipe, bottom drainage hole design, hang the water pipe when washing, put down the water pipe after washing, and automatically drain.Extended hose design, no need to move to drain the water, bring you convenience.
In addition, our mini washing machine is made of TPE and food-grade silicone material, which is a great choice for your personal belongings, baby products, and patient's family!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars One medium ladies shirt= spinner couldn’t handle it
reviews.reviewText: I washed one shirt….washing was great…it was the “spin cycle” terrible. ONE SHIRT ladies size medium… it couldn’t handle it!!!!! Shook violently and kept coming off the spinner base.
